message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a price that is still significantly higher than my cost, while saving you $500 compared to the full value. I believe this offer presents a great value proposition for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.
